title: Steven Romick of First Pacific Advisors Buys 3 New Stocks in Q3
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
Steven Romick (Trades, Portfolio), president of the $19.6 billion FPA Crescent Fund (FPACX), bought three new stocks in the third quarter,... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
